forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. SSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. SSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
